title: Voli and Mord are dead on OP.GG
body:
Lets rework Ez, Kayle and Morgana guys

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

replies.body:
Kayle's been waiting for her rework since season 2.
Morgana's there because they want to rework them together for some reason.
Because their lores were always tied together.
Ask Thanos to unsnap his fingers then.
